name: Time Synth By: Riley Waldo, Alexander Dorenkamp, and Conner Hegion
name_original: Time Synth By: Riley Waldo, Alexander Dorenkamp, and Conner Hegion
description: Game is not fully developed at all but I hope you like some of the neat features and enjoy completing the game. Lives don't reset after game over, falling off with zero lives doesn't set off game over screen, animations could be better, but it fine!
